v: Functions have ceased and the asset is dormant; pending relinquishment, etc.
condition_standard: Condition can be allowed to deteriorate or marginally maintained at minimal cost

v: Functions are providing essential support only, with no critical operational role (e.g. storage) or asset has limited life
condition_standard: Condition needs to meet minimum operational requirements only
Assets to be in reasonable condition, fully meeting operational requirements

v: Business operations requiring good public presentation and high-quality working environments
condition_standard: Assets to be in good condition operationally and aesthetically, benchmarked against industry standards for that particular class of asset

v: Highly sensitive functions with critical results or high-profile public building
condition_standard: Assets to be in best possible condition, only minimal deterioration will be tolerated
